GK19maghspvu:3289: śriyā juṣṭaṃ divyaiḥ sapaṭaharavairanvitaṃ puṣpavarṣair vapuṣṭacaidyasya kṣaṇamṛṣigaṇaiḥ stūyamānaṃ nirīya /
GK19maghspvu:3290: prakāśenākāśe dinakarakarānvikṣipadvismitākṣair narendrairaupendraṃ vapuratha viśaddhāma vīkṣāṃbabhūve // MSpv_20.79 //
